emotions.name: Happiness
emotions.description: A positive emotion characterized by feelings of joy, pleasure, and contentment.

emotions.name: Sadness
emotions.description: A negative emotion characterized by feelings of loss, grief, and unhappiness.

emotions.name: Fear
emotions.description: A negative emotion characterized by feelings of apprehension, anxiety, and uncertainty.

emotions.name: Anger
emotions.description: A negative emotion characterized by feelings of frustration, irritation, and hostility.

emotions.name: Surprise
emotions.description: An emotion characterized by feelings of unexpectedness or astonishment.

emotions.name: Disgust
emotions.description: A negative emotion characterized by feelings of revulsion or repulsion.
